Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Restructure homepage navigation: Category-based dropdowns with overflow prevention

âœ… Replaced single mega menu with 7 separate category dropdowns
âœ… Each category organized by: Cities, States, Industries, Service Types

1. SEO Services - States (12), Cities (12), Industries (8)

7. About & Resources - Company pages (4)

TECHNICAL IMPLEMENTATION:
- CSS: Replaced .mega-menu with .dropdown-menu system
- CSS: Added nth-last-child(-n+3) right-alignment for edge prevention
- CSS: Grid layout with auto-fill columns for responsive organization
- JavaScript: Mobile accordion toggle with auto-close behavior
- JavaScript: Debounced resize handler for breakpoint changes
- Responsive breakpoint: 1024px mobile/desktop transition

OVERFLOW PREVENTION FEATURES:
- Desktop: max-width 90vw prevents horizontal overflow

- Social Media: 20 links (12 cities + 8 industries)
- Content Marketing: 20 links (12 cities + 8 industries)
- Web Design: 14 links (6 services + 8 industries)
